sense.gloss: eggplant (Solanum melongena), aubergine
squash, pumpkin
rugosa rose (Rosa rugosa), Japanese rose, Ramanas rose
Chinese scarlet eggplant (Solanum integrifolium), tomato-fruit eggplant
tomato (Solanum lycopersicum)

k_ele.e: 瓜の蔓に茄子はならぬ
瓜の蔓に茄子は生らぬ

r_ele.r: うりのつるになすびはならぬ

sense.gloss: like begets like, the apple doesn't fall far from the tree, eggplants don't grow on gourd vines
slow-witted person, dimwit, halfwit
faded, dull-colored eggplant
small eggplant
Japanese yellow loosestrife (Lysimachia japonica)
Carolina horsenettle (Solanum carolinense)
Solanaceae (nightshade family of plants)
var. of eggplant (Solanum melongena) which can be eaten raw
pickled (in rice bran or vinegar) (whole) eggplant
tomato (Solanum lycopersicum)
Solanum (nightshade genus of plants)
nipplefruit (Solanum mammosum), apple of Sodom, titty fruit, cow's udder
nipplefruit (Solanum mammosum), apple of Sodom, titty fruit, cow's udder
nipplefruit (Solanum mammosum), apple of Sodom, titty fruit, cow's udder
autumn eggplant, eggplant picked in the autumn

k_ele.e: 秋茄子は嫁に食わすな

r_ele.r: あきなすはよめにくわすな

sense.gloss: don't feed autumn eggplant to your wife (because they're too delicious, because they'll give her the chills, or because their lack of seeds will reduce her fertility)
long, slender eggplant

k_ele.e: 親の意見と茄子の花は千に一つも無駄はない

r_ele.r: おやのいけんとなすびのはなはせんにひとつもむだはない

sense.gloss: always listen to your parents, always value your parents' advice, not even one in a thousand of a parents' opinion or an eggplant flower are in vain
dusky purple, dark purple, eggplant color
Kamo eggplant (Solanum melongena; round variety originally grown in Kyoto)

r_ele.r: いちふじにたかさんなすび

sense.gloss: best is Fuji, second is a hawk, third is an eggplant (of auspicious things to see in a dream, esp. one's first dream of the year)
grilled eggplant, fried eggplant
mabo nasu, fried eggplant with Chinese chili sauce
globe eggplant, American eggplant

sdata.j: ↑瓜↑↓ふり↓のつるに↑茄子↑↓なすび↓はならぬ。
sdata.e: You don't get eggplants from a gourd vine.

sdata.j: ↑瓜↑↓ふり↓のつるに↑茄子↑↓なすび↓はならぬ。
sdata.e: You can't make a silk purse out of a sow's ear.
